images.copyright: Magellanic penguins in the Falkland Islands (© Vicki Jauron, Babylon and Beyond Photography/Getty Images)
images.title: Look at these lovebirds
images.caption: Happy Valentine's Day!
images.copyrightonly: © Vicki Jauron, Babylon and Beyond Photography/Getty Images
images.desc: Love is in the air today: it's Valentine's Day! Across the globe, millions of flowers will be sent, and romantic restaurants will be fully booked. This holiday has its origins in the story of Saint Valentine, a 3rd-century Roman priest who, according to legend, secretly married couples to spare the husbands from conscription into the Roman army.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
